concise_definition: n. 埃德蒙顿（加拿大阿尔伯塔省省会）

definitions.explanation_en: The capital city of the province of Alberta, Canada, located in the central part of the province along the North Saskatchewan River. It is a major cultural, economic, and administrative center known for its extensive park system and annual festivals.
definitions.explanation_cn: 加拿大阿尔伯塔省的省会，位于该省中部、北萨斯喀彻温河沿岸，是重要的文化、经济和行政中心，以其广阔的公园系统和年度节庆活动而闻名。
definitions.example_en: Edmonton is home to the West Edmonton Mall, one of the largest shopping centers in North America.
definitions.example_cn: 埃德蒙顿拥有西埃德蒙顿购物中心，这是北美最大的购物中心之一。
